fulltitle.i: Pointing out a mode for adjusting the Claims of the Citizens of this State, against the Creek Nation.

law.p:

SEC. 1. SEC. 2. And be it further ena[UNK]cted by the authority aforesaid; That his Excellency the Governor, be and he is hereby authorised and required, to deliver to the Comptroller General, such claims or demands as are now deposited in the Executive Department against the
Creek Nation, and also all which may be received within three months from and after the passing of this a[UNK]ct.

SEC. 3. SEC. 4. SEC. 5. law.shorttitle: IN THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Thursday, 18th November, 1802.

BE it therefore Resolved, That the Judges of the Superior Courts within their respe[UNK]ctive distri[UNK]cts, are hereby authorized and required, to appoint three commissioners in such counties of this state, as appears from the presentments of their Grand Juries, that the accounts have remained in an unsettled state, and the commissioners so appointed, are hereby authorised and required, to call for such documents or other testimony, as in their judgment will tend to explain and elucidate the subje[UNK]ct before them; and in case of any commissioner or commissioners so appointed refusing to a[UNK]ct, or vacancy happening from any cause, it shall be the duty of the judge
